head.title: Split {{FileFormatUp}} documents in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to separate {{FileFormatUp}} files into multiple documents. Easily manage PDFs, Word files, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio diagrams, images, archives, and more.

header.title: Split {{FileFormatUp}} files into parts
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} enhances {{EnvNameShort}} applications with advanced document processing. Split {{FileFormatUp}} files effortlessly and work with a variety of commonly used formats.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: What is {{ProdShortName}}?
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a feature-rich document processing library supporting 50+ file types, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It allows developers to merge, split, extract, rearrange, swap, and remove pages, streamlining document operations within applications.

more_features.title: Advanced document management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a powerful toolkit for efficiently processing over 50 popular file formats.

feature_1.title: Merge different document types
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word documents, spreadsheets, presentations, Visio drawings, images, and archive files. Apply customization settings for precise output.

feature_2.title: Rearrange document structure
feature_2.content: Modify document layout by moving, swapping, or deleting pages to organize content more effectively.

feature_3.title: Adjust page orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any angle or switch between portrait and landscape orientations.

feature_4.title: Extract selected pages
feature_4.content: Choose specific pages or page ranges and save them as a separate document.

formats.title: Split multiple document formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file types, making it easy to modify documents with precision.

operations.title: Main features
operations.description: Explore the key capabilities of our document processing library.

steps.title: How to break {{FileFormatUp}} documents into parts

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) makes it easy to split {{FileFormatUp}} files, extracting selected pages and saving them as a new document. Integrate efficient document processing into your {{EnvName}} applications.
content.step_2: Choose where to save the output file.
content.step_4: Process and save the separated document.

code_1.title: Extract even pages from a {{FileFormatUp}} file
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to split a {{FileFormatUp}} file and save all even-numbered pages into a new document.
code_1.comment_4: Set up split options for even pages
code_1.comment_5: Perform the split and save the output
